xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 08 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 12:21 <marta> has left #medsavant 13:35 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 13:40 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 13:42 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu 13:43 <sdumitriu1> Hey bvancea 13:43 <bvancea> sorry for checking so late 13:43 <bvancea> had my diploma exam today 13:43 <sdumitriu1> How did it go? 13:43 <bvancea> I'm writing the status email now 13:44 <sdumitriu1> Went for a drink with your colleagues? 13:44 <bvancea> it was pretty ok 13:44 <bvancea> I got 10/10 13:44 <bvancea> :) 13:44 <bvancea> the weekend was sort of chaotic 13:45 <bvancea> the advisors gave me some money to re-deploy the app on the cloud 13:45 <bvancea> to show at the practical presentation 13:45 <bvancea> the comitee teachers were not that interested, the barely managed to see it 13:46 <bvancea> nah, I went out with my gf 13:46 <bvancea> she had her exam today as well 13:46 <sdumitriu1> Congratulations! 13:47 <bvancea> thanks:) 13:49 <sdumitriu1> How did she do? 13:49 <bvancea> she got a 10/10 aswell 13:50 <sdumitriu1> Excellent 13:50 <bvancea> yup :) 13:51 <sdumitriu1> I'm wondering what happened to Miro 13:52 <bvancea> he didn't get in the IRC ? 13:52 <bvancea> these last few days? 13:53 <sdumitriu1> Not since the last hangout 13:53 <bvancea> hmmm 13:54 <bvancea> did anyone try to send him an email or something? 13:54 <sdumitriu1> I asked Marc to send him an email last week 13:54 <bvancea> I see 13:54 <bvancea> I suppose he didn't answer 13:59 <bvancea> is it common for gsoc students to "fall of the grid" like that? 13:59 <sdumitriu1> No, not really 14:00 <bvancea> oh, I see 14:00 <sdumitriu1> It happens, for a few days, but they should at least send an email saying that they have some problem 14:00 <sdumitriu1> I'll send him an email 14:01 <bvancea> well, maybe something did actually happen 14:32 <sdumitriu1> A few weeks ago we had the same problem with another student 14:32 <sdumitriu1> Turned out he was stranded by floods 15:04 <bvancea> oh, I see 15:30 <sdumitriu1> OK, so Miro is sick 15:31 <bvancea> yup, seem so 16:43 <marta> has joined #medsavant 17:08 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant
